amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the special transfer authority in section 1702 is subject to appropriation Acts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569 to clarify that the special transfer authority in section 1702 is subject to appropriation Acts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
